 2021-05802021-06-17ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ACT in order to (1) extend the temporary doubling of the Canada Student Grants (CSG)for eligible full-time and part-time students, students with dependants and students with permanent disabilities, as well as the adult learner top-up, until July 31, 2023; (2) make permanent the flexibility to use current year’s income instead of previous year’s income determining eligibility for CSG.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0138 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
